amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to provide weapons in Syria.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to provide weapons in Syria.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fortenberry amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 244 (Roll no. 328).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Fortenberry amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 244 (Roll no. 328).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Fortenberry.
